MapUberModPowerCharges.name: of Power
MapUberModPowerCharges.text: Monsters gain a Power Charge on Hit | Monsters have +1 to Maximum Power Charges

MapUberModFrenzyCharges.name: of Frenzy
MapUberModFrenzyCharges.text: Monsters gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit | Monsters have +1 to Maximum Frenzy Charges

MapUberModEnduranceCharges.name: of Endurance
MapUberModEnduranceCharges.text: Monsters have +1 to Maximum Endurance Charges | Monsters gain an Endurance Charge when hit

MapUberModMinusMax.name: of Exposure
MapUberModMinusMax.text: Players have -20% to all maximum Resistances

MapUberModCrit.name: of Deadliness
MapUberModCrit.text: +(70-75)% to Monster Critical Strike Multiplier | Monsters have (650-700)% increased Critical Strike Chance

MapUberModPoison.name: of Venom
MapUberModPoison.text: Monsters Poison on Hit | Monsters have 100% increased Poison Duration | All Damage from Monsters' Hits can Poison

MapUberModCurses.name: of Curses
MapUberModCurses.text: Players are Cursed with Vulnerability | Players are Cursed with Temporal Chains | Players are Cursed with Elemental Weakness

MapUberModAOEPlayer.name: of Impotence
MapUberModAOEPlayer.text: Players have 50% less Area of Effect

MapUberModCritDefence.name: of Toughness
MapUberModCritDefence.text: Monsters take 100% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

MapUberModShrineBuff.name: of Domination
MapUberModShrineBuff.text: Unique Monsters have a random Shrine Buff

MapUberModNoCharges.name: of Powerlessness
MapUberModNoCharges.text: Players cannot gain Power Charges | Players cannot gain Frenzy Charges | Players cannot gain Endurance Charges

MapUberModJuggernaut.name: of the Juggernaut
MapUberModJuggernaut.text: Monsters cannot be Stunned | Monsters' Action Speed cannot be modified to below Base Value | Monsters' Movement Speed cannot be modified to below Base Value

MapUberModFlaskMeteor.name: of Imbibing
MapUberModFlaskMeteor.text: Players are targeted by a Meteor when they use a Flask

MapUberModNoRegen.name: of Stasis
MapUberModNoRegen.text: Players cannot Regenerate Life, Mana or Energy Shield | Players cannot Recharge Energy Shield

MapUberModNoBlockNoSuppress.name: of Vulnerability
MapUberModNoBlockNoSuppress.text: Players cannot Block | Players cannot Suppress Spell Damage

MapUberModAuraEffect.name: of Doubt
MapUberModAuraEffect.text: Players have 90% reduced effect of Non-Curse Auras from Skills

MapUberModRecoveryRate.name: of Smothering
MapUberModRecoveryRate.text: Players have 80% less Recovery Rate of Life and Energy Shield

MapUberModActionSpeed.name: of Deceleration
MapUberModActionSpeed.text: Players have 4% reduced Action Speed for each time they've used a Skill Recently

MapUberModSirusGround.name: of Desolation
MapUberModSirusGround.text: Area has patches of Awakeners' Desolation

MapUberModMinionSpeed.name: of Revolt
MapUberModMinionSpeed.text: Players' Minions have 50% less Attack Speed | Players' Minions have 50% less Cast Speed | Players' Minions have 50% less Movement Speed

MapUberModRareFracture.name: of Splinters
MapUberModRareFracture.text: 25% chance for Rare Monsters to Fracture on death

MapUberModChain.name: Chaining
MapUberModChain.text: Monsters' skills Chain 3 additional times | Monsters' Projectiles can Chain when colliding with Terrain

MapUberModDamageRotation.name: Cycling
MapUberModDamageRotation.text: Players and their Minions deal no damage for 4 out of every 10 seconds

MapUberModProjAOE.name: Magnifying
MapUberModProjAOE.text: Monsters fire 4 additional Projectiles | Monsters have 100% increased Area of Effect

MapUberModLifeAsEnergyShield.name: Buffered
MapUberModLifeAsEnergyShield.text: Monsters gain (70-80)% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield

MapUberModMonsterSuppress.name: Oppressive
MapUberModMonsterSuppress.text: Monsters have +100% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

MapUberModMonsterAttackBlock.name: Stalwart
MapUberModMonsterAttackBlock.text: Monsters have +50% Chance to Block Attack Damage

MapUberModReflect.name: Punishing
MapUberModReflect.text: Monsters reflect 20% of Physical Damage | Monsters reflect 20% of Elemental Damage

MapUberModRareMonsters.name: Antagonist's
MapUberModRareMonsters.text: Rare Monsters each have 2 additional Modifiers | (35-45)% increased number of Rare Monsters

MapUberModVines.name: Grasping
MapUberModVines.text: Monsters inflict 2 Grasping Vines on Hit

MapUberModDamageAsElemental.name: Prismatic
MapUberModDamageAsElemental.text: Monsters gain (180-200)% of their Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element

MapUberModDamageAsChaos.name: Profane
MapUberModDamageAsChaos.text: Monsters gain (80-100)% of their Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

MapUberModTurbo.name: Fleet
MapUberModTurbo.text: (35-45)% increased Monster Cast Speed | (35-45)% increased Monster Attack Speed | (25-30)% increased Monster Movement Speed

MapUberModSawblades.name: Ultimate
MapUberModSawblades.text: Players are assaulted by Bloodstained Sawblades

MapUberModPlayerCurseEffect.name: Hexwarded
MapUberModPlayerCurseEffect.text: 100% reduced Effect of Curses on Monsters

MapUberModResistancePDR.name: Protected
MapUberModResistancePDR.text: +50% Monster Physical Damage Reduction | +55% Monster Elemental Resistances | +35% Monster Chaos Resistance

MapUberModMonsterAilments.name: Afflicting
MapUberModMonsterAilments.text: Monsters Ignite, Freeze and Shock on Hit | All Monster Damage can Ignite, Freeze and Shock

MapUberModMarkedForDeath.name: Retributive
MapUberModMarkedForDeath.text: Players are Marked for Death for 10 seconds | after killing a Rare or Unique monster

MapUberModPercentDamage.name: Equalising
MapUberModPercentDamage.text: Rare and Unique Monsters remove 10% of Life, Mana and Energy Shield from Players or their Minions on Hit

MapUberModImpaleDetonation.name: Impaling
MapUberModImpaleDetonation.text: When a fifth Impale is inflicted on a Player, Impales are removed to Reflect their Physical Damage multiplied by their remaining Hits to that Player and their Allies within 1.8 metres | Monsters' Attacks Impale on Hit

MapUberModShaperTouched.name: Valdo's
MapUberModShaperTouched.text: Rare monsters in area are Shaper-Touched

MapUberModTotemCount.name: Ancestral
MapUberModTotemCount.text: Players have -2 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

MapUberModTrapMineCount.name: Sabotaging
MapUberModTrapMineCount.text: Player Skills which Throw Traps throw 1 fewer Trap | Player Skills which Throw Mines throw 1 fewer Mine

MapUberModTotemLife.name: Parasitic
MapUberModTotemLife.text: 15% of Damage Players' Totems take from Hits is taken from their Summoner's Life instead

MapUberModAllyPunishment.name: Distanced
MapUberModAllyPunishment.text: Players in Area take 20% increased Damage per nearby Ally

MapUberModSynthMiniboss.name: Synthetic
MapUberModSynthMiniboss.text: Map Boss is accompanied by a Synthesis Boss

MapUberModExarch.name: Searing
MapUberModExarch.text: Area contains Runes of the Searing Exarch
